name: The Casino Incident
description:
Translation into other languages is made with the help of Yandex.Translator (original text: Russian) https://translate .yandex.com/

Casino sounds are provided by the website https://freesound.org/

Audio and video converted via the website https://www.online-convert.com/ru

The images are made and processed through the GIMP program (GNU Image Manipulation Program) https://www.gimp.org/

The code of the novel is written using the Notepad++ text editor https://notepad-plus-plus.org/
